display: PDF Conjurer (backend) | Request external conjure PDF

APY.caption: Insert the previous PDF Conjurer Server-side step result
APY.name: config_info

APb.caption: Set data header
APb.doc: Add the data header at the beginning of content (data:application/pdf;base64, ...).
APb.name: set_data_header

APc.caption: Return URL for PDF content
APc.doc: The URL of the publicly exposed backend workflow or API endpoint the PDF result will be sent to.
APc.name: return_url_for_pdf_content

APe.caption: Error return URL
APe.doc: The URL of the publicly exposed backend workflow or API endpoint a possible error message should be sent to. Optional, but highly recommended.
APe.name: error_return_url

APf.caption: Additional data
APf.doc: Optional. In case you want to send additional data needed for the external environment to function properly. Just a text box, use as desired, for example by sending a raw JSON object or any unique ID so you know later on what was that specifc PDF about.
APf.name: additional_data

APg.caption: External function URL
APg.doc: The URL of the external function to be called.
APg.name: external_function_url
